name: Negpay qrcode Payment Gateway
author: Davkharbayar

sections.description:
This Plugin enables WooCommerce shopowners to instant payments through bank apps like banking app to save payment gateway charges in Mongolia.

Visit our demo site to see the payment methods in action

Demo Site

Benefits

  • Simple & Easy to Setup.
  • Avoid Payment Gateway Fees.
  • Instant Settlement.
  • Direct Payment.
  • 100% Success Rate.
  • 24×7 Availibilty.
  • Multisite Network Supproted.
  • No Renewal/Subscription.

Feedback

  • We are open to your suggestions and feedback. Thank you for using or trying out one of our plugins!
  • Visit plugin site.
sections.installation:
Requirements

  • A negpay Merchant account
  • An installed Woocommerce plugin

Plugin installation

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’.
  2. Search for ‘Negpay QR Code Payment Gateway’ and install it.
  3. Or you can upload the negpay-qr-code-payment-for-woocommerce folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory manually.
  4. Activate QR Code Payment Gateway from your Plugins page.
  5. After activation go to ‘WooCommerce > Settings > Payments > negpay QR Code’.
  6. Enable options and save changes.
